specials.heading: Stay 2 Nights and get 3rd Night FREE
specials.content:
Now through March 31, 2016

Escape today to Split Rock Resort now through March 31 for a fun filled getaway with spectacular winter savings. Stay 2 Nights and get the 3rd Night FREE. Don’t wait, take advantage of this exclusive deal today.

BOOK Now

*Three night minimum required. Taxes, 19% service charge and a daily resort fee of $20 plus tax per occupied room not included. Daily Resort Fee is valid for all reservations confirmed on/after December 14, 2015. Offer cannot be combined with any other offer or discount program. Higher rates and/or minimum stay may be in effect for certain special events, holidays, and peak travel periods. Rates subject to change without notice. Some restrictions/blackout dates apply.

specials.heading: Bed & Breakfast
specials.content:
Start your day off right with a delicious and energizing breakfast. Our Bed & Breakfast Package includes accommodations and daily breakfast at on-site Split Rock Grille.

STARTING FROM $114 PER NIGHT BOOK NOW

Booking/Travel: Year-round
* Taxes, 19% service charge and a daily resort fee of $20 plus tax per occupied room not included. Daily Resort Fee is valid for all reservations confirmed on/after December 14, 2015.

specials.heading: Splash & Stay
specials.content:
Our Splash & Stay Package includes accommodations for up to 4 at Split Rock Resort and 2 single-day passes to on-site H2Oooohh! water park. With over 53,000 square feet of exciting slides, activity pools, wave pools and other water attractions, H2Oooohh! offers excitement for all ages.

STARTING FROM $135 PER NIGHT BOOK NOW

Booking/Travel: Travel dates based on water park schedule
* Taxes, 19% service charge and a daily resort fee of $20 plus tax per occupied room not included. Daily Resort Fee is valid for all reservations confirmed on/after December 14, 2015.

specials.heading: Romance Package
specials.content:
Spend a romantic getaway in the Poconos on tranquil Lake Harmony. Our Romance Package includes accommodations in a spacious Willowbrook Suite, complete with fireplace and jacuzzi, dinner for two, daily breakfast, and champagne and chocolate-covered strawberries upon arrival.

STARTING FROM $219 PER NIGHT BOOK NOW

Booking/Travel: Year-round
* Taxes, 19% service charge and a daily resort fee of $20 plus tax per occupied room not included. Daily Resort Fee is valid for all reservations confirmed on/after December 14, 2015.

specials.heading: Senior Discount - Ages 50 and Better
specials.content:
You're not over the hill. You’ve simply conquered it! We offer exclusive vacation savings at Split Rock Resort for guests 50 and better. Valid ID required at check-in.

STARTING FROM $89 PER NIGHT BOOK NOW

Booking/Travel: Year-round
* Taxes, 19% service charge and a daily resort fee of $20 plus tax per occupied room not included. Daily Resort Fee is valid for all reservations confirmed on/after December 14, 2015.

specials.heading: AAA/CAA Membership Discount
specials.content:
We are pleased to offer discounted rates to members of AAA (American Automobile Association) and CAA (Canadian Automobile Association). Just be sure to show your membership at check-in.

STARTING FROM $89 PER NIGHT BOOK NOW

Booking/Travel: Year-round
* Taxes, 19% service charge and a daily resort fee of $20 plus tax per occupied room not included. Daily Resort Fee is valid for all reservations confirmed on/after December 14, 2015.

specials.heading: Corporate Travelers
specials.content:
Whether you’re traveling for business or pleasure, you can enjoy great savings at Split Rock Resort. Please present your business card at check-in.

STARTING FROM $89 PER NIGHT BOOK NOW

Booking/Travel: Year-round
* Taxes, 19% service charge and a daily resort fee of $20 plus tax per occupied room not included. Daily Resort Fee is valid for all reservations confirmed on/after December 14, 2015.

specials.heading: Government Discount
specials.content:
Special discounted rates are available for all federal, state and local government employees and contractors. Valid government ID required at check-in.

STARTING FROM $89 PER NIGHT BOOK NOW

Booking/Travel: Year-round
* Taxes, 19% service charge and a daily resort fee of $20 plus tax per occupied room not included. Daily Resort Fee is valid for all reservations confirmed on/after December 14, 2015.

specials.heading: Military Appreciation Rate
specials.content:
Thank you for your service! Active military members enjoy discounted rates at Split Rock Resort. Valid military ID required at check-in.

STARTING FROM $89 PER NIGHT BOOK NOW

Booking/Travel: Year-round
* Taxes, 19% service charge and a daily resort fee of $20 plus tax per occupied room not included. Daily Resort Fee is valid for all reservations confirmed on/after December 14, 2015.
